lender.name: Todd Michael
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help others
lender.occupational_info: I design mechanical and electrical systems for buildings

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: if I can, but do not, then who will?
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of sales and technical support for our company in Alaska.

lender.name: Johannes
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I hope that is some small way my contribution can help someone lift themselves to a new level of living and to give them encouragement
lender.occupational_info: I work on a small block of land where we produce our own vegetables and fruit. I also volunteer at a Trade Aid store helping people from overseas countries participate in a free trade market

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microcredit and I love being part of a global community connecting to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Identifying challenging community needs and connecting programs and services to those in need in suburban Minnesota.

lender.name: Hanna Azemati
lender.loan_because: lending is the new giving!

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: Even though I'm on a tight budget, I can still afford to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office at my university where I am a full time student. I also am a waitress at a local Welsh pub.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I have travelled and have seen the difference a few $ can make to entrepreneurs to lift themselves and their families out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with clients who need insurance and investment advice.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: other people can use my money more effectively than me, I think.
lender.occupational_info: Studying as much as possible.

lender.name: Jake
lender.occupational_info: I am studying the world and learning about myself

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: This is how I started my career too. It works!
lender.occupational_info: Financier

lender.name: Joe & Sarah
lender.loan_because: my wife and I truly want everyone to have the one oppurtunity that can change your life forever. My wife and I both struggled financially before we met. Since then we have become financially savy due to professional and personal success over the last couple of years. we feel with success, comes gratitude! Now that we are in the financially comforatble; we feel it is only right to help those who want a better life for themselves. NOT JUST A HANDOUT!!!
lender.occupational_info: Sarah is a nurse and is responsible for the overall health of 18 elderly patients. Joe is a manager for a construction rental company and is responsible for the overall safety of my employees and profit of the store.

lender.name: Roya Khairzad Evans
lender.loan_because: I was born in Afghanistan and moved to the US (Virginia) when I was 4 years old. I came back to Kabul in 2004 and I was saddened by how many women and children needed help. Now, I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Software Test Engineer for a technical consulting company. The program I work on is called USAID (United States Agency for International Development)

lender.name: Brice
lender.loan_because: I want to create new possibilities for people to be happy.
lender.occupational_info: I lend millions to companies world-wide.

lender.name: matthew
lender.loan_because: cause it is most awesome
lender.occupational_info: tv

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I have enough. Others don't. And I think microfinance can bring the world a little closer together.

lender.name: adam & kim
lender.loan_because: As my 3 year old puts it, "Jesus said share!"
lender.occupational_info: I teach people about Jesus and my wife doctors their physical needs

lender.name: Willy
lender.loan_because: it makes my heart feel happy.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage the love of books and reading in adults & children.

lender.name: jesse
lender.loan_because: i'm obliged in virtue of the inequity that exists, they don't deserve not to have the money they need to build their lives any more than i deserve to be in a position to help.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a journalist

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: It's hands down the best way to help the third world. Just giving people food or money does not help them nearly as much as investing in a business that is sustainable. I love the idea of a personal connection and investment in another human's life. I am so proud that concepts like micro-loaning are coming into focus nationally. I can't wait to see where things go with it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student at UW-Madison. On the side, I am also a musician, and I work as an audio/visual specialist.

lender.name: Nate & Angie
lender.occupational_info: We live in the state of Michigan, located in the Midwestern USA. Nate arranges groups and events for a museum. Angie teaches performing arts in the area schools.

lender.name: virginia
lender.loan_because: I have worked with fthe poor of the world and appreciate their need for assistance
lender.occupational_info: nurse practitione/clinics

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I design and build websites.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: Want to help entrepreneurs improve their business.
lender.occupational_info: Helping connecting information to people

lender.name: Dayna
lender.loan_because: i want to help the world
lender.occupational_info: its very tiring but rewarding

lender.name: Ryo
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting those who need a helping hand and are willing to work hard for a better life
lender.occupational_info: I transplant organs

lender.name: Joy, Tony, and Lauren
lender.loan_because: We want to help other families.

lender.name: Hanny
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe in entrepreneurial initiative! Lending directly to prescreened projects in my areas of interest lets me share in their efforts and successes. I LOVE the opportunity to participate!
lender.occupational_info: As a folk dance teacher I share the cultural and recreational traditions of many ethnic groups and acquaint others with them, contributing to better appreciation and understanding through opportunities to participate.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: my heart is bigger than my wallet. I'm a very compassionate person and can't imagine not giving a helping hand to people in need. With Kiva, I'm able to give many times over !!

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a medical doctor in the United States. I hope to be able to use what I learn for both local and international outreach.

lender.name: JD Eddins
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is the mission of Christians to help those who are in need. I have blessed in order to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work at Capstone Treatment Center, a Christ-centered drug treatment center for young men ages 14-24.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I have everything I really NEED and am so thankful. I can't imagine passing this opportunity up.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers all day for an American company.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it's fun !
lender.occupational_info: I write software for web sites.

lender.name: Calvin College Info Tech
lender.loan_because: In Michigan, we get a $.10 refund for aluminum cans, so we're recycling AND using the refund money for a good cause.
lender.occupational_info: We support the usage and installation of computers at Calvin College.

lender.name: Irena
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have more than I need, so it's a privilege to be able to share.

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: I want to help people not just through handouts but to actually make changes for good in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help museums to achieve their missions. As part of what I do, I research online giving options and opportunities for museums.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org has created an effective, efficient and compassionate way to help entrepreneurs throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an emergency department physican and director in a hospital in Florida.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: $25 to take my daughter to the movies or $25 so a guy can buy some more goats. No contest really.
lender.occupational_info: I look after my house and my children, grow the vegetables, cook the food and make sure my family is happy and safe.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: As a self-employed person, I understand some of the difficulties faced by entrepreneurs and I am thankful for this opportunity to help people start their own businesses and be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: A lot of staring at a computer screen :-)

lender.name: Bekah
lender.loan_because: I want to help make others' lives more abundant and healthy.
lender.occupational_info: I recently graduated from college, got married, and am now working as a freelance make-up artist.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to better them selves and their family. Along making them feel good about who they are and what they have accomplished. On a selfish level it also makes me feel good to give someone that opportunity in life.

lender.name: Ugo
lender.loan_because: words are cheap... and so is Kiva. But Kiva can make the difference in somebody's life. And that's enough for me.

lender.name: Janet
lender.occupational_info: Lake Winnipesaukee, New Hampshire

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: I was born/raised in Liberia, West Africa My parents picked up and moved there as young, new doctors - lived there for almost 25 years. As a young child, I grew up seeing poverty and disease but just as equally , experienced a life of simplicity and happiness. I loan because I believe the world can only survive if we extend unconditional kindness to others. Every human being in this world can contribute, however small it is, to the solution of another person's problem
lender.occupational_info: As a nurse I work in a hospital and take care of patients with a history of heart problems. I also work as a school nurse taking care of students with disabilities, illnesses, social problems, etc. I find my job very rewarding and feel blessed to be able to help others.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: it's rarely this easy to have an impact

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: It could easily be me in this kind of situation and I'm eternally grateful for my blessings and good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: As a psychotherapist I assist people to live their lives more fully by helping them come to know who they are, heal their own hurts, and realise their own individual gifts.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: Economic progress is a decentralized process of discovery. It depends on imagination and talents of individuals, who respond to ever changing conditions and preferences. Supporting these folks directly make much sense.

lender.name: Angry Dad
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is cool.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I am a believer in micro credit and feel this method is best suited to address the needs of those in developing economies.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying International Business at the University of Georgia and am emphasizing in finance.

lender.name: Dierdre
lender.loan_because: it's a privilege to be able to loan, and I'm inspired by the beautiful and brave stories.

lender.name: Harlene
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I have spent my working life as a school counselor working with children 5 - 18.

lender.name: Murty
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing executive at a Silicon Valley company. I started this company in 2006 to develop products for mobile phones.

lender.name: Parthav
lender.loan_because: There is an abundance of wealth in the First World... there is no need to horde it.

lender.name: Shauna and Jeff
lender.occupational_info: We serve food in a fancy Chinese Restaurant.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nancy Ann & Baldev Raj
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans are an excellent way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: As a returned Peace Corps volunteer I know how much it means to enterprising people who have no access to funds for start-up and improvements to their businesses. Plus, my current loan is to a group in the area where I served as a volunteer!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a small college and provide health care to the students.

lender.name: Laura & Brad
lender.loan_because: it makes us feel good :)

lender.name: Cesar
lender.loan_because: I believe in cooperation.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I am continually seeking ways to help others. I thought I would give kiva.org a try.
lender.occupational_info: I am an insurance agent. I help others manage risk in their lives.

lender.name: Boyd
lender.loan_because: Delray Beach, Florida Sharing makes one's life whole.

lender.name: Jean Prouvaire
lender.loan_because: it's a way of most directly getting money to self-motivated people who need it, and the peer-to-peer principles underlying microfinancing are intriguing.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it feels right!

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: My wife Stacey and I recently got married and one of our most precious gifts, a Kiva gift certificate was given to us by our friend Andy. We feel very fortunate about the lives we live. Our hope is that this gift will enable others to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a video editor which means I take raw footage and piece it together to make half-hour or one hour shows for television. My wife Stacey is a writer and producer for television which means she develops stories and concepts for broadcast.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Microlending/Microenterprise is a great idea, and an easy way for anyone to make a big difference over a great distance.
lender.occupational_info: Bringing people and resources together to fight poverty.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It gives me an opportunity to give. By choosing a real person, I get a true sense of making a difference to an individual and their family. And I get to experience that yes, one person really can make a difference in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses promote themselves. I find the best words to help them get their message across to their prospective customers. It could be for their website, a letter, a newsletter, a brochure or an advertisement.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea, and I want to help others with future success.
lender.occupational_info: I work on military aircraft for the United States Navy, I repair the electrical systems responsible for flight and navigation, along with weapons and communication systems.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is fun and rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: My teachers give me lots of work to do such as writing essays.

lender.name: Paola
lender.loan_because: I am much more fortunate than others.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: it was a gift I recieved at Christmas
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and care for my three children, ages 1, 3, and 6.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It's a joy.
lender.occupational_info: I write software instructions for a living. My time is full of family and work and creative living.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I develop software and manage the infrastructure that support large corporate databases.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: It matters
lender.occupational_info: I like to build, put together complex machines from simple pieces. All problems are best solved by taking the first step.

lender.name: Penguin Knight
lender.loan_because: My grandma managed to have run a clothes store by collecting scrap fabrics from different people. I believe this small loan idea is viable and meaningful.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all it takes is a few steps to reach the top of a mountain
lender.occupational_info: Provide travel experiences for fun and advancement of the knowledge of cultures

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to succeed.

lender.name: jeff
lender.occupational_info: Hoping for the best ...

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It is one way I can help those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital, where I arrange all the papers that the physicians and nurses use.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Everyone can use a helping hand.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: When we as a society cease to help each other, humanity is diminished.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I loan because I'm lucky enough to be able to help others. It's wonderful to have the opportunity to so easily make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a nonprofit organization.

lender.name: Tinuviel
lender.loan_because: Jesus would.
lender.occupational_info: Housecleaning and organizing. I am in college studying economics, too.

lender.name: Terry-Jo
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: fast paced, demanding, challenging and fun

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It's a blessing to help others

lender.name: Lorrie
lender.loan_because: I believe small business is sustainable, has a greater positive impact on a community and a smaller destructive footprint than large business. If you give a fisherman a fishing pole, he'll feed his village.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze web sites and track their traffic, visits, visitors and other conversion metrics that can make a web site sucessful.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: "Success is where preparation and opportunity meet." - Bobby Unser
lender.occupational_info: I teach and manage computers at a rural school.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I didn't realize that for the cost of one take away meal, I was able to assist someone who like me has family, friends, dreams and aspirations.

lender.name: Designing Dreams
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others make their dreams come true, as others are helping make our dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: We are a non-profit organization that teaches youth (ages 8 -15) entrepreneurial skills with hands-on instruction in making high quality leather designs.

lender.name: Vanessa and Fabio
lender.loan_because: The good you do to others is the same you do to yourself.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I always wanted to help the poor and I finally have a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Since I'm a kid I go to school and do chores to help my family.

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by people that are entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I farm 2500 acres in Canada. Farming involves taking risks because there are many factors that a person has no control over such as the weather and the price you will recieve for your product.

lender.name: Gena
lender.loan_because: What a way to see the world!

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: It is an easy and fun way to help people and I know that the money actually gets where it is supposed to go.
lender.occupational_info: I provide academic advice to students at my university and help them solve problems when they come up.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business and it is extremely challenging to get started without a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make the best use of their financial resources.

lender.name: tim & alison
lender.loan_because: we believe that people who "have" should share with those who do not. everyone should be given an opportunity to better their life and community.
lender.occupational_info: tim is a studying sociology at the university of washington. alison works for a research company building lasers.

lender.name: Juli
lender.loan_because: we're here to help each other and share our good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I work from my home on the computer, doing information research and data compiling and entry. I also transcribe medical research manuscripts. And I care for my elderly mother, with whom I live.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Why? The Sermon on the Mount, sir. - Kenneth Whistler (via Kurt Vonnegut)

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and would like to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I gather and help publish data about the job markets of Louisiana.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed at whatever they choose. I have been helped in the past. And now I wish to pass on a little assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I help people overcome their fears. Not just in speaking in public, but in being themselves.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I would like to see a better world for all grandchildren.
lender.occupational_info: I build systems to pump drinking water, irrigation water and sewage.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I have had lots of friends from other countries. I want to help in ways my loans can do the most good.
lender.occupational_info: I work with doctors and nurses providing information about clinical tests and help in getting the results, answers about tests

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I hope to make some small positive difference in the lives of ordinary people like myself.
lender.occupational_info: I turn students on the the wonder that comes from understanding the Earth.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know you can make a difference in someone elses life.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I've been graciously helped when I was in need and this appeals to me so I can do the same to some degree.
lender.occupational_info: Design materials to help businesses sell their services through print, web, photography or video.

lender.name: Shoker
lender.loan_because: I love to help people it makes me happy
lender.occupational_info: SIKH from PUNJAB , INDIA.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. Life is short and I have not been helpful enough in my time on earth so far.
lender.occupational_info: I run a store that sells computers

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I provide tax advice and planning to individuals and businesses.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: because I like to help people succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university creating web pages, videos, and other projects. I also administer the university's youth programs.

lender.name: Dcengr
lender.loan_because: The more I give, the more I earn
lender.occupational_info: Trade equities, commodities, etc

lender.name: Kiran
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Karina
lender.loan_because: I realise that I am incredibly fortunate to have what I need and more, and that there are many, many people in the world who are not so fortunate - despite working incredibly hard. I also think this is a wonderful program - seeing such a small step make such a big difference. Surely we are on this planet to help each other - we are all in it together, and Kiva helps to make this a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I am a naturopath, which means I use natural medicine (herbs, vitamins and food) to help people who are sick.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: It helps people achieve their goal.
lender.occupational_info: While I am retired, I also teach on-line for a College in The State of Maine, USA.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because:
I found out about Kiva.org through Super Nerdfighters John and Hank Green and their project Brotherhood 2.0 now on it's second year at http://nerdfighters.ning.com/
Their efforts to increase Awesome world wide and to reduce world wide suck showed me that even I could do something to help.
lender.occupational_info: I was in the Army for 22 years and am now retired and have started some small scale farming.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: it is a chance to pay a token towards the great debt I owe for all that has been given me in life.
lender.occupational_info: We have so much in this country people actually pay to store what they can't use - furniture, clothes, books. I work in the small office attached to a large warehouse that has been partitioned into lockers for people to bring items they no longer need or use but won't let go to others.

lender.name: Dilvin
lender.loan_because: i want to make a (good ) difference.
lender.occupational_info: IT + ERP @ Using IT as Business enabler.

lender.name: Clement & Emily
lender.occupation: Acting Captain & Counselor of Starship Enterprise
lender.loan_because: the needs of the many outweights the needs of the few...or one.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I want my son to know how lucky he is.

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupation: I fly around the Country and I attend meetings
lender.loan_because: ... Well, I loan because I can and because I should.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: i heal the sick

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because:
The IMF won't help these people and we can through Kiva.
I refuse to hoard what I don't need, while others struggle for what I've taken for granted. I'll teach a man to fish, and put my money where my mouth is.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a non-denominational nihilist with a tendency to manic charitable giving.

lender.name: Paul and Kym
lender.loan_because: World citizens should be helping those less fortunate, at home and abroad.
lender.occupational_info: Research and education.

lender.name: Laci Seber
lender.loan_because: Why not? Why wouldn't one help people who want to help themselves if it takes this little effort.

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: While on a build site with Habitat for Humanity in Uganda, I met this wonderful inspiring woman Glenda. She visited some Kiva-supported business owners in person. Talking to her reassured me that Kiva and the partnered local banks were handling the money with integrity. I became a lender soon after. What a great way to be connected with the rest of the planet.
lender.occupational_info: I do medical research to develop new treatments for metabolic diseases.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe in the Jewish concept of tzedakah (justice) which requires sharing what you have.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a teacher, but now help only informally, We have adopted and raised 5 children and just welcomed our 4th grandchild. And I have 2 little online stores where I sell my artwork and supplies for others.

lender.name: David and Denise
lender.loan_because: After serving along the Texas/Mexico border as employment missionaries, we have become convinced that helping others become more self-reliant is the only way to wipe out poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Spanish and Elementary teachers. We now are involved in helping index the preserved digitized images of important genealogical documents.

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: it is important
lender.occupational_info: teacher and mother

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: we can help make poverty history by making trade and commerce fair

lender.name: Team
lender.loan_because: although we are only in the third grade we want to do our part to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: we are students

lender.name: Mike & Dana
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to better their life.

lender.name: Ailson Reis
lender.loan_because: I am a graphic designer. I have a small digital camera , whose i use to record videos at local small business to upload at youtube. I need a to lend $2 000 to buy a real camera with audio in, and a computer to make edition.
lender.occupational_info: I record advertisement videos to post at youtube

lender.name: Gene Daley
lender.loan_because: I travel the world in my spare time and enjoy meeting people from different cultures. In addition to local community donations, this is my way of reaching across the globe to help others who may be in need.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps to bridge the gaps between colleagues and customers created by differences in locations, cultures and ways of communicating. We offer virtual training, skill development and process facilitation in the areas of teamwork, distance coaching and virtual meeting management. Gene Daley , Founder

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I believe we all need to help each other in order to make this a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies find and use the best technology for their business.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be born into a great family and country that provided me with unlimited opportunities. When you’re that lucky, you have a responsibility to share.
lender.occupational_info: Pay it forward!!!

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: it can make a hug difference in someone's life and it costs me very little.

lender.name: Dwane
lender.loan_because: I can "really" help at least one other person on this great planet that we all live on. It makes me feel like I can actually share part of the wealth of my World.
lender.occupational_info: I am just an old retired guy living on a hill top with my dogs and watching the World go spinning by. I do a pretty good garden and I am trying to learn to use a computer.

lender.name: Re Bond
lender.loan_because: One of the best ideas I have heard about to combat poverty, this is not a hand out. I feel lucky to have a chance to give a hand up!

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I
lender.occupational_info: Nursing Student

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of ambition. We all need help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I am in US Army.

lender.name: Beata & Mariusz
lender.loan_because: Most of us at some point in our lives in one way, or another received some financial support from family, friends, or "strangers" in difficult times. We're blessed to live in a highly developed country with lots of possibilities to grow financially and we also would like to extend the same invitation and landing hand to those, that are doing their best to meet their family's basic existential needs like food, shelter, health and education.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I'm fortunate to be able to spare a few dollars here and there to help others help themselves. What goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a firefighter in a small city providing fire protection and emergency medical services. I also inspect public buildings to insure that they are safe for occupancy.

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to get a chance, make the most of it, and beat the odds.
lender.occupational_info: I help others resolve disputes. I read and write a lot, and face new challenges every day. I enjoy every minute of it.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: mortgage banker, single mother of 2 boys

lender.name: Megan
lender.occupation: General Manager of a Non Profit

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I want to help end world poverty!
lender.occupational_info: My work is challenging and rewarding.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be able to be become an entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a transitional homeless shelter during the day, and at night ansd on weekends I am working on the theatre company that I started with college friends.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I publish a newsletter for librarians in small libraries; I write books on library management; and I have a blog (on the Internet).

lender.name: Tracie
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 4, two boys and two girls. i stay home to take care of them.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: All people deserve a chance to live a prosperous life!
lender.occupational_info: Protecting and serving the people of my community

lender.name: Wai Ling
lender.loan_because: I want to help and add value to others people live.

lender.name: Chris Van Wie
lender.loan_because: It's the easiest thing in the world to do.
lender.occupational_info: My role is to understand customer requirements and provide the solution using proprietary software.

lender.name: Alison & Rob
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org offers such a simple, reasonable way to enable others to make their business dreams come true. We loan because we should.
lender.occupational_info: We create Internet-hosted software applications targeted to small business vertical markets. We also design and build large, custom applications for socially responsible clients. Our software is in use around the world in dozens of languages and currencies.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others live the best life they can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are ill in the hospital.

lender.name: Alexandria
lender.loan_because: Life is about uplifting one another :O)!
lender.occupational_info: I am a military broadcast journalist..I do television news and radio for the army.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because:
I believe these loans will not only effect the lives of the ones borrowing for their business, but it will cause a chain reaction to effect generations to come. A small investment can begin to change the world.
Andy Andrews says it best in his book, "The Butterfly Effect". " There are generations yet unborn whose very lives will be shifted and shaped by the moves you make and the actions you take today. And tomorrow. And the next day. And the next".
I loan in Gordon's memory to make people aware of Shelty Rescue Dogs. These dogs are given up for adoption and make the most wonderful pets in the world. Gordon was one of these very, very special ones. He left us 7/16/09, but his memory will live on forever.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I have always worked for myself....I was able to begin this process 40 years ago because of a small loan from my Dad. Everyone who wants to be self employed and willing to do the work should have that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I help families create an environment of Wellness in their lives...health, wealth, family and social. I am a manufacturer rep for a world wide health and wellness company.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Dreams, hopes and faith in others. What life is all about.

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. If I can spend $25 on going to a movie or buying pizzas for dinner, I can certainly loan that amount to make a difference in someone's life!
lender.occupational_info: I do not work outside the home due to a disability, but I am a leader of both boy and girl scouts, and strive to set a good example for them.

lender.name: beth
lender.occupation: neon sign maker, bead store owner

lender.name: Hope
lender.occupation: stay at home mom & substitute teacher

lender.name: Darryl
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and would hope that i could pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: Software Engineer

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I have started a small home-based business, and keeping it going is tough; I want to help others who are tryng to make a living for themselves in whatever small way I can.
lender.occupational_info: When physicians are called to consult on patients in the hospital, or when they admit a patient from the emergency room, it is my job to determine the correct level of service; then I submit the correct charge to the patient's insurance company for payment.

lender.name: frann
lender.loan_because: I think it is the right thing to do. It is my pleasure to help people who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Nyanda
lender.loan_because: Jesues said, "When you have helped the least of these you have helpe me."
lender.occupational_info: I have been an Early Childhood Educater for since 1994 and I understand the joy of being an entrepreneur and making a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Arlen
lender.loan_because: I find it rewarding helping others who are in need!
lender.occupational_info: It is in the field that i love, so i find it fun and interesting.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: In my country, I'm considered "low income", but in other countries, I would be considered rich. That humbles me. This is a way I can afford to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: my husband and I are following our dream of owning our own business and God has provided for us and our business is doing well. We would like to help others have the same oportunity that we have been given.
lender.occupational_info: We own a small plumbing company, mostly drain cleaning. We provide a service that keeps indoor plumbing running and safe for our customers.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed, I want to ---- no---- I NEED to "pass it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small (2 people) cafe in the middle of Ky, and even though I don't own the place, I can really identify with the Kiva recipients. I am so BLESSED with my life, family and job that I just HAVE TO pass it forward. God Bless you all.

lender.name: Cliff
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Tannifer
lender.loan_because: I want to give hope & be a resource.
lender.occupational_info: Medical Staffing.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I believe that people are the best thing to invest in

lender.name: Jerrell
lender.occupation: Stay at home mother, Business Owner
lender.loan_because: I understand how hard life can be. .
lender.occupational_info: I used to work outside the home for a great corporation, but decided that staying home with my kids was much more important. We have 5 children: a 7 yr old, 4 yr old twins, a 3 yr old, and my baby is 16 months old. We also just started our own trucking business! So we're busy, busy, busy! :)

lender.name: Chris & Sara
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of small change making a big difference

lender.name: Sue Ann
lender.loan_because: I've been looking for a way to make a difference in the lives of others. Kiva makes it simple. I also enjoy reading about the businesses myself and others are supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a rural hospital in the emergency room. We average 60-70 patients per day. I enjoy my job as a nurse, especially when the acuity level is high.

lender.name: Sonali
lender.loan_because: I want to enable someone to help themselves be independent. I hope this person would help another person & it would continue throughout the community.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: In my life there have been people who have given me a chance to succeed and I wanted to pass on their kindness to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a foundations that gives money to organization to help them give back to the community. One organization needed money to care for children while their parents worked.

lender.name: John & Lisa
lender.loan_because: That's the best way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: My husband operates a construction website and does sales & marketing for the company as well. I am a stay at home mom with our 3-month old son, Max.

lender.name: Gavin, Owen and Sawyer
lender.loan_because: It's a great way for us to reach out, help others and give back - an important life lesson in our family.

lender.name: Kenneth W
lender.loan_because: I like to help and share.
lender.occupational_info: I trained other firefighters to do their job.

lender.name: meg
lender.loan_because: Because I believe in a hand up not a hand out.

lender.name: Sierra Middle School
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care about the businesses in the world that need help getting started.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students at Sierra Middle School that love to learn.

lender.name: M & B
lender.loan_because: It always helps to pay it forward!

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: My contributions though small to me, make a difference to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get the most from the things they use daily.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.occupational_info: I work for a mid-size architectural firm based in Dallas, TX that specializes in multi-family housing of all types--senior housing, affordable housing, student housing, apartment living, etc.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in the third world build a business in order to support and raise their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in information technology analysis for a large organization. I review security procedures and policy designed to protect our IT systems.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I'm paying it forward!

lender.name: Rosie
lender.loan_because: I want to pay forward the help others have given me .I want to help people working to improve their future prospects the way that I did thru the kindness of people who cared.
lender.occupational_info: I provide a place for young children to stay during the day while their parents are at work.I am going to college to finish my teaching degree as well.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupation: SAHM, homeschooling mother, NFP, CBE teacher & NCP

lender.name: Jeremy and Jeff
lender.loan_because: My partner and I are interested in offering whatever we can to help folks who are developing a better plan for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology and Security

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is Starting up and Keeping things going.

lender.name: Amanda de Sousa
lender.loan_because: Compro roupas de hip hop em São Paulo e revendo em Brasília.Precisava de R$2.000 reais para poder aumentar meu estoque e conseguir abrir uma loja fixa!

lender.name: JUDY
lender.loan_because: i believe in helping others help themselves to be able to take care of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: My job helps doctors be able to diagnose a patients health issues.

lender.name: gracie
lender.loan_because: i have a heart.
lender.occupational_info: im a lover of love.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a break.
lender.occupational_info: changing the face of education...

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: it is an amazingly effective way to directly help people without the interference of governments.
lender.occupational_info: I sell reference materials to schools and libraries. I have been both a teacher and a librarian.

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: I see the importance of making people feel that they have self-worth, and give them a chance to prove to their family that they can contribute to their family's needs!
lender.occupational_info: I use old wood, like from an old barn, that is going to be burned, and I salvage that wood, and give it a new life, in the form of a table, vanity, etc.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: because I can. By an accident of birth I have had many opportunities available to me. I hope my loans can give others the opportunity to fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired after teaching mathematics for 30 years.

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: We are all connected. It is my duty as a human being to give with love.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who haven't been given the opportunities that I have been given.

lender.name: Father Bill
lender.loan_because: I have been given to.
lender.occupational_info: one day at a time, un dia a la ves.

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because:
I want to give back and give them a chance to change their lives.
This makes me happy! :)

lender.name: Akisa
lender.occupational_info: I hand pick expensive jewelry pieces and gemstones for my customer.

lender.name: Doug & Fay & family
lender.loan_because: We want to help others who are trying to improve themselves or care for their families. Someone helped us; now we want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Doug sells oil products & propane; Fay helps children who are hurt or abandoned by their parents.

lender.name: Deniz
lender.loan_because: I Care!
lender.occupational_info: Manager of an Automotive Repair Shop

lender.name: carroll
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do AND they pay back. Thrse folfs need help and are working hard. I admire them and theri tenacity. And the paybakk of the loan is phrnominal/
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychotherapist, working exclusivility with registered sex ofenders. Thank you for asking.

lender.name: Xaviona
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed, I have traveled the world and seen many things. I believe it is our responsibility to help others succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I have done many jobs. I currently attend school full time. I plan to increase my knowledge and ability to help others.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: To help others benefit from the free enterprise system we in the USA are blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: Construction and housing development

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I have seen the impact that microloans can have on women's lives in Africa. Small businesses empower women otherwise trapped by poverty and gender inequality, and more income for women translates into better health and education for their children.

lender.name: Mohd Khairul Hairi
lender.loan_because: To help people
lender.occupational_info: I am a Bussinesman too

lender.name: Kevin Ann Chris & Steven
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is a great way to help those who are working to improve their lives and those of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank that make loans to people who are trying to buy homes.
